description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Education & Professional Studies majoring in Elementary Education, with the intent of becoming a teacher. Eligibility Requirements Elementary Education major Must have completed 12 semester hours at UCO GPA must not be lower than 2.0 nor higher than 3.20 Must be enrolled in UCO College of Education & Professional Studies, preparing to become a teacher Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
